slide.title: The workers of Karnaphuli Shoe Industries Ltd at Korean Export Processing Zone in Chittagong yesterday clashed with police over payments of wages and vandalised four of its units. a firefighter tries to douse a fire set up by the workers. Photo: Anurup Kanti Das
A man shows the burnt-out offices of the factory. Photo: Anurup Kanti Das. Photo: Anurup Kanti Das
Another fireman at work. Photo: Anurup Kanti Das
Policemen take a look at fire extinguishers after the clashes that left one worker dead and 15 injured. Photo: Anurup Kanti Das
